sources.title: 1951 - Mask of the Dragon - A Manhunt that began in KOREA AND ENDED IN CRIME!
sources.description:
An American army officer (Richard Emory) in South Korea agrees to deliver a jade dragon statuette to an address in Los Angeles. He is murdered soon after arriving in the city and his friend private detective Phil Ramsey (Richard Travis) takes up the investigation with the assistance of his girlfriend Ginny (Sheila Ryan).

Title: Mask of the Dragon (1951) 
Alternative title: Dragon of Death
Colorized version https://youtu.be/YwBk1rNdmk8

Director: Sam Newfield
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdbsnmiLvP8gxPJtJcbe5jcE
Writer: Orville H. Hampton
Actors: Richard Travis, Sheila Ryan, Sid Melton, Lyle Talbot

Genres: Crime, Drama
Release date: March 10, 1951
Filming location: California, USA

metadata.Plot: Lt. Dan Oliver, an American soldier in Korea, agrees to deliver a jade dragon statuette to a curio shop in Los Angeles. Soon after his arrival, he is murdered. Phil Ramsey and Ginny O'Donnell trace the murder to the shop of Professor Kim Ho. Ramsey receives a package mailed to him by Oliver from Honolulu that contains the jade dragon, and takes it to the curio shop to force a showdown with Kim Ho. He is attacked by Ho's hoods and is about to be killed when Ginny arrives with Police Lt. McLaughton and the police.
metadata.Actors: Richard Travis, Sheila Ryan, Sid Melton
